fields.text: Thank you for calling The RealReal, your premier destination for authentic luxury consignment.
To begin consigning your luxury items, press [INDEX].
To schedule a free shipping kit for your consignment, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our shipping kit team.
To find a drop-off location near you, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our location services team.
For questions about purchases or order status, press [INDEX].
To check the status of an existing order, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our order status team.
To initiate a return or exchange, press [INDEX].
Please hold while we connect you to our returns department.
